summary: Comprehensive testing of Global Radio Station new features completed. All features working correctly: 1) Background station health checking with live/offline counts, 2) Re-verify button for offline stations, 3) LocalStorage database for favorites/podcasts with Export/Import functionality
seed_data_creation: Test favorites created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working: 1) Background health checking uses /api/stations/verify-batch endpoint - runs after stations load, displays live(green)/offline(red) counts in header 2) Re-verify button appears when offline stations exist - rechecks offline stations 3) Favorites now use localStorage (LocalDataContext.js) - Export button downloads JSON backup, Import button uploads and merges favorites 4) Podcast favorites use heart button on PodcastCard.js - stored in localStorage 5) FavoritesPage shows Export/Import/ClearAll buttons and info message about LocalStorage

background_health_checking.notes: Stations checked via /api/stations/verify-batch after loading. Shows 'Checking...' indicator during process.

live_offline_counts.notes: Header displays green wifi icon with live count (20) and red wifi-off icon with offline count (10). Toast shows '20 live, 10 offline stations'.

station_sorting.notes: Live stations (green dot) appear at top, offline stations sorted to bottom. sortedStations memo in HomePage.js handles sorting.

reverify_button.notes: Red 'Re-verify' button appears when offline stations exist. Clicking rechecks offline stations via verify-batch endpoint.

favorites_localstorage.notes: Favorites stored in localStorage (key: globalradio_favorites). Heart button toggles favorite. Toast 'Added to favorites' confirms action.

export_button.notes: Export button in FavoritesPage downloads JSON file (globalradio_backup_YYYY-MM-DD.json) with favorites and podcastFavorites.

import_button.notes: Import button accepts JSON file, merges with existing favorites. Toast shows imported counts.

clear_all_button.notes: Clear All button appears when favorites exist. Shows confirmation dialog before clearing.

podcast_favorites.notes: Heart button on each PodcastCard toggles favorite. Stored in localStorage (key: globalradio_podcast_favorites). Toast 'Podcast added to favorites'.

verify_batch_endpoint.notes: /api/stations/verify-batch accepts array of stations, returns {stationuuid, is_live, checked_at} for each. Limits to 50 stations max.

localstorage_info_message.notes: FavoritesPage shows info banner: 'Local Storage: Your favorites are saved in your browser. Use Export to backup and Import to restore on other devices.'
